system.availability: For Psykers, +2 Psy Rating for 1d5+1 minutes, but may not use powers at fettered level for duration and +10 to Psychic Phenomena Rolls. For Non-Psykers, causes immediate Psychic Phenomena.
system.cost: Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.
